name: Apoli Console
description: The Apoli console table by Kifu Paris is both dramatic and organic in its unique design. The cream shagreen inlaid top sits on an ethereal geometric and sculptural bronze-patina brass base. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. Part of the Apoli Capsule Series. The finish of the shagreen is authentic as it is hand-dyed, and the designer calls the finish look: 'antique natural shagreen.'Currently made to order 8-10 weeks. Design SKU reference KCON10-BR01/BRG. All Kifu Paris pieces are handmade by artisans, ultimately making each piece unique. Custom color/sizing available on request. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines.
